entry.title: Blizzard Warning issued December 23 at 8:08PM AKST until December 24 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occurring. Northeast winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts as high as 65 mph. entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS AND AREAS OF BLOWING SNOW...
